## GpioLevel enum

The GPIO level at the time an alert was triggered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum GpioLevel 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  LOW | <code>0</code> |  |
|  HIGH | <code>1</code> |  |
|  WATCHDOG | <code>2</code> |  |
